Entries.default: The heat given off by the massive brazier is almost unbearable. Its flame burn nearly to the height of a man, licking along the edges of the metal as if eager to escape.

You heave your grim burden into the brazier, where it lands with a scattering of embers. 

The body burns with unnatural swiftness in the flames, reduced to ash within what seems to be mere moments.
"Magran's flames have scoured you clean. Face whatever comes with a bold heart."
